name: creait-code
description: AIを活用したウェブコンテンツ生成ツール。デザインから高品質なHTMLとSCSSを自動生成します。

scripts.dev: npm run vite-build && npm run electron-dev
scripts.dev:win: npm run vite-build && npm run electron-dev:win
scripts.build-python-standalone: rm -rf dist/python_server build/python_server && pyinstaller --onefile --name python_server --collect-all PIL --collect-all cv2 --collect-all numpy --collect-all requests --hidden-import=io --hidden-import=base64 --hidden-import=json --hidden-import=re --hidden-import=datetime --hidden-import=traceback --hidden-import=logging --hidden-import=math --hidden-import=collections --hidden-import=requests --add-data "src/python/modules:modules" src/python/python_server.py
scripts.build-python-standalone:mac: rm -rf dist/python_server build/python_server && pyinstaller --onefile --name python_server --collect-all PIL --collect-all cv2 --collect-all numpy --collect-all requests --hidden-import=io --hidden-import=base64 --hidden-import=json --hidden-import=re --hidden-import=datetime --hidden-import=traceback --hidden-import=logging --hidden-import=math --hidden-import=collections --hidden-import=requests --add-data "src/python/modules:modules" src/python/python_server.py && ls -la dist/
scripts.build-python-standalone:arm64: rm -rf dist/python_server build/python_server && pyinstaller --onefile --name python_server --collect-all PIL --collect-all cv2 --collect-all numpy --collect-all requests --hidden-import=io --hidden-import=base64 --hidden-import=json --hidden-import=re --hidden-import=datetime --hidden-import=traceback --hidden-import=logging --hidden-import=math --hidden-import=collections --hidden-import=requests --add-data "src/python/modules:modules" src/python/python_server.py && ls -la dist/ && cp dist/python_server dist/python_server_arm64
scripts.check-arch: arch -x86_64 /bin/bash -c 'echo "現在のアーキテクチャ: $(uname -m)"'
scripts.build-python-standalone:x64: rm -rf dist/python_server build/python_server && arch -x86_64 /usr/bin/python3 -m pip install --user PyInstaller && arch -x86_64 /usr/bin/python3 -m pip install --user pillow opencv-python numpy requests && arch -x86_64 /usr/bin/python3 -m PyInstaller --onefile --name python_server --collect-all PIL --collect-all cv2 --collect-all numpy --collect-all requests --hidden-import=io --hidden-import=base64 --hidden-import=json --hidden-import=re --hidden-import=datetime --hidden-import=traceback --hidden-import=logging --hidden-import=math --hidden-import=collections --hidden-import=requests --add-data "src/python/modules:modules" src/python/python_server.py && ls -la dist/ && cp dist/python_server dist/python_server_x64
scripts.package-mac: npm run prebuild && npm run vite-build && npm run build-python-standalone:mac && electron-builder --mac && mkdir -p release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/ && cp dist/python_server release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/ && chmod +x release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/python_server
scripts.package-mac-universal: npm run prebuild && npm run vite-build && npm run build-python-standalone:arm64 && npm run build-python-standalone:x64 && electron-builder --mac && mkdir -p release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/ && cp dist/python_server_arm64 release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/python_server_arm64 && cp dist/python_server_x64 release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/python_server_x64 && cp scripts/python_server_launcher.sh release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/python_server && chmod +x release/mac-universal/CreAIteCode.app/Contents/Resources/app/python_server*
scripts.package-win: npm run prebuild && npm run vite-build && npm run build-python-standalone && electron-builder --win --x64 --ia32 && npm run copy-python-standalone
scripts.package-linux: npm run prebuild && npm run vite-build && npm run build-python-standalone && electron-builder --linux && npm run copy-python-standalone
scripts.package: npm run prebuild && npm run vite-build && npm run build-python-standalone && electron-builder && npm run copy-python-standalone
scripts.check-python: node -e "require('./src/electron/python_bridge').checkPythonEnvironment().then(result => console.log('Python環境チェック結果:', result)).catch(err => console.error('Python環境チェックエラー:', err))"
